speakers.name: Linus
speakers.bio: Linus is a good boy that has a passion for attention. With almost 2 years of experience in constant meowing for affection, Linus has mastered the art of getting people to notice him. Linus will share his ground breaking discoveries on trading belly rubs for kitty treats.

speakers.name: Beetle
speakers.bio: Beetle is an independent aries who loves to eat garbage. Since discovering plastic goes in the trash can, Beetle is constantly evolving new techniques and patterns to retrieve this noisy object. Beetle will be sharing the brutal manner on destroying hands that get too close to his belly.

speakers.name: Caspa
speakers.bio: Caspa has successfully earned the coveted title of Fattest Cat in the House, gaining a total of 16lbs. While his family claims to never see him eat, Caspa's weight proves otherwise. Caspa will be speaking on his experience with knocking down cat trees due to being too heavy.

speakers.name: Yheti
speakers.bio: Yheti is a sassy girl who loves to play fetch. She is an expert in attacking male cats and establishing dominance in her cat tree. Yheti will be sharing her expierence in poofing up her tale when excited, and sitting in inconvenient spots.

speakers.name: Neville
speakers.bio: Neville has passion for butt scratches and blessing humans with her presence. She has mastered the art of hiding in unknown spaces and minding her own business. Neville will share her techniques for seeming msyterious yet pure.
